item.title: About
item.description: About Lifelong student trying to learn a little of everything. General Interests History of computing/technology Computer architecture Electronics Low-level programming Electromagnetism Hobbies Tinkering Weightlifting Self-studying Watching anime Video games Favorite Languages: C, Assembly, Python, and Go Career In summary, I’m a software engineer with the majority of my experience in backend development with Java and Postgres. My resume with more detail is available at /resume.

item.title: Museum
item.description: Over the years I’ve been collecting various old things while I study the history of computing. I’m fascinated with old technology and hope I keep growing my little “museum” over the years.
